scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm run dev" "cd frontend && pnpm run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm start" "cd frontend && pnpm start"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && pnpm run lint && cd ../backend && pnpm run lint
scripts.test: cd backend && pnpm test && cd ../frontend && pnpm test
